title: What lvl do you unlock free champs
body: I am level 8 and still dont have the right free champs, checked and supposedly it is lvl 6. BUT im lvl 8 and still have shit gnar and nami champs

replies.body: I am lvl 10 and dont got the champions on rotation yet. still got the old

Hey there, per the[ champion guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864-Choosing-the-Right-Champion)they should unlock after level 10.  There were some changes recently to free champion rotation, so newer players get specific champs for a little longer.
ok thanks, and btw sorry i didnt know this was an actual riot support section sorry for swearing oWo
made an alt account and i'm currently lvl 10. i do not have the champ rotation yet, so it's probably lvl 11 or really close.
